answers.answer: Welcome to the gastroenterology community!  What medications is she on?  Is she on any narcotics?  What other medical conditions does she have?
she took now librax and spasmo canulase .she is diapetic patient .and she not take any narcotics

Many people with diabetes develop gastroparesis which is slow emptying of the stomach which can cause pain after eating and constipation often goes along with it.  I would recommend she talk to her GI doctor about this.
